description: This Python source file implements backend services for generating and managing performance-related recommendations for MongoDB instances. It includes functions to analyze metrics, suggest configuration adjustments such as connection pooling, indexing, and TTL indexes, and interface for persisting and retrieving recommendations within a FastAPI-based application.
